text: #Remdesivir & #chloroquine inhibit 2019-nCoV in vitro: https://t.co/GsxCxojcxv Learn more about the characteristics of #nCoV2019 and explore important information websites & other useful resources in our [#Labome review] article which gets updated daily: https://t.co/a2Et7NFGqB https://t.co/FgNlzsNUxv
